    • BookmarkBar

      public BookmarkBar​(int relpos, DefaultScreen screen)
      create bookmark bar
      Parameters:
      relpos - y position this bookmark bar starts at
      screen - screen this bookmark bar is part of

    • getBookmarks

      public GUITable getBookmarks()
      Get The table of all bookmarks
      Returns:
      A GUITable with one row where all bookmarks are

    • handleKeyEvent

      public void handleKeyEvent​(int id, int keyCode, char keyChar, int modifier)
      handles the key-presses while the address bar is in focus
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the pressed button
      keyCode - The keycode for the pressed button
      keyChar - The char that was pressed
      modifier - The modifier on the pressed key

    • handleMouseEvent

      public void handleMouseEvent​(int id, int x, int y, int clickCount)
      handle the mouse event on the bookmark bar
      Parameters:
      id - The id off the mouse event
      x - The x coordinate of the mouse event
      y - The y coordinate of the mouse event
      clickCount - The click count of the mouse event
